feed.title: Posts tagged with tone: Dan Dart's Blog: Software, Mathematics, Radio, Music

entry.title: The rules of tone in text
entry.content:
Here's what I've found so far. I'll keep you updated if there are more:

Normal.

Emphasised!

** Really emphasised **!

Important also

-I didn't mean to say this, perhaps a mumble-

eXCITABLE

dErP vOiCe!

^Sarcasm^.

Have you got any more?
